serviceData.name: Painless Root Canal Treatment
serviceData.description: The outer portion or Crown of a tooth is a three-layered structure namely  Enamel, Dentin & Pulp. If the tooth decay is limited to the first two layers, it can be corrected with Filling/ Restoration. In case the tooth decay reaches the third layer and causes inflammation or infection of pulp, an RCT or Endodontic Treatment is needed. A dentist at the nearest dental clinic should be consulted at the earliest in such cases.
